ANOVA Test for each gene

Source: R/utils.R
Anova_info.Rd

This function is to test the two-way significance of cell type specific expression cross subjects.

Anova_info(eset, non.zero = TRUE, markers = NULL, clusters, samples,
  select.ct = NULL, num.info = 25, ...)

Arguments

eset

single cell ExpressionSet
non.zero

logical, default as TRUE. If TRUE, we only use gene that have non-zero expression
markers

vector of characters, default as NULL. If NULL, use all genes in eset
clusters

character, the name of phenoData used as clusters
samples

character, the name of phenoData used as samples
select.ct

vector of cell types included, default as NULL. If NULL, include all cell types in x
num.info

numeric, number of selected gene for each cell type. Default at 25

Value

a list of

  • F statistics of samples;

  • F statistics of clusters;

  • F statistics of two-way ANOVA;

  • selected informative genes: high F statistics for clusters compare to samples

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
